content: it s spa time welcome back to the 2021 fiber flux summer crochet along…yippee we are working an amazing series of projects this time…the summer spa getaway cal each week we ll make a different spa item everything is listed below on the schedule and at the end you ll have a beautiful collection of spa themed crochet items that you can use for self-care or lovely gifts too this series is easy and fun…meant to be a relaxing easy going summer project all part of our spa theme this is the spa headband a gorgeous closed shell headband that can be used for keeping the hair off of the face with creams masks etc or simply wear it as a fashion statement too it s that pretty
